class="diff-context"><div>{{crime-stub}}</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 19:07, 30 March 2010</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-style ambox-Orphan" role="presentation" style="display: none"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><a href="/wiki/File:Wiki_letter_w.svg" class="image"><img alt="Wiki letter w.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/40px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/60px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/80px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="44" data-file-height="44" /></a></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">This article <b>is an <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Orphan" title="Wikipedia:Orphan">orphan</a>, as no other articles <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Whatlinkshere&amp;target=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty&amp;namespace=0">link to it</a></b>. Please <a href="/wiki/Help:Link" title="Help:Link">introduce links</a> to this page from <span class="plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special%3ASearch&amp;redirs=1&amp;search=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty&amp;fulltext=Search&amp;ns0=1&amp;title=Special%3ASearch&amp;advanced=1&amp;fulltext=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty">related articles</a></span>; try the <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//edwardbetts.com/find_link?q=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty">Find link tool</a> for suggestions. <small><i>(March 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-content ambox-Notability" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">The topic of this article <b>may not meet Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Notability_(people)" title="Wikipedia:Notability (people)">notability guideline for biographies</a></b>. <span class="hide-when-compact">Please help to establish notability by adding <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">reliable, secondary sources</a> about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merge" title="Wikipedia:Merge" class="mw-redirect">merged</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Redirect" title="Wikipedia:Redirect">redirected</a>, or <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deleted</a>.<br /> <small><span class="plainlinks"><i>Find sources:</i>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?as_eq=wikipedia&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;num=50">"Murder of Jennifer Daugherty"</a>&#160;–&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;tbm=nws">news</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+site:news.google.com/newspapers&amp;source=newspapers">newspapers</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?tbs=bks:1&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">books</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">scholar</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/action/doBasicSearch?Query=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;acc=on&amp;wc=on">JSTOR</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/images?safe=off&amp;tbm=isch&amp;tbs=sur:fmc&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+-site:wikipedia.org+-site:wikimedia.org">free images</a></span></small></span> <small><i>(February 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Jennifer Daugherty</b> was a 30-year-old woman who was <a href="/wiki/Torture_murder" title="Torture murder" class="mw-redirect">tortured and murdered</a> in <a href="/wiki/Greensburg,_Pennsylvania" title="Greensburg, Pennsylvania">Greensburg, Pennsylvania</a> in February 2010.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>During <a href="/wiki/Torture" title="Torture">torture</a> and abuse sessions, which lasted for a total of more than two days, Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume <a href="/wiki/Feces" title="Feces">feces</a> and <a href="/wiki/Urine" title="Urine">urine</a><sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup> and <a href="/wiki/Detergent" title="Detergent">detergent</a>, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake <a href="/wiki/Suicide_note" title="Suicide note">suicide note</a>, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup> According to her relatives, Daugherty had the mental abilities of a 12 to 14-year-old, she trusted everyone, and she had thought that the suspects were her "friends."<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Allegheny County Coroner <a href="/wiki/Cyril_H._Wecht" title="Cyril H. Wecht" class="mw-redirect">Cyril H. Wecht</a>, who has conducted and reviewed thousands of autopsies of homicide victims, stated, "... This is one of the most horrific cases I have seen... You have one young, defenseless woman, six people who are keeping her captive and doing all of these things, knowing she is [mentally challenged]. Put it all together, it is bizarre, it is extreme barbarism."<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5"><span>[</span>5<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2010/02/16/us/AP-US-Disabled-Woman-Torture.html">Feds: Pa. Torture Death Might Be Hate Crime</a>, The New York Times, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10063/1040265-100.stm">6 held for trial in Greensburg torture, slaying</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, March 4, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml">Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers</a>, CBS News, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/02/12/AR2010021201815.html">Pa. family: 'Friends' torture, kill disabled woman</a>, The Washington Post, February 13, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-5">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10045/1035865-59.stm">How slaying victim came to know her attackers</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, February 14, 2010</span></li> </ol> </div> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" style="background:transparent"> <tr> <td><a href="/wiki/File:Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg" class="image"><img alt="Stub icon" Torture Death Might Be Hate Crime], The New York Times, February 16, 2010&lt;/ref&gt;</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>'''Jennifer Daugherty''' was a 30<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">-</ins>year<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">-</ins>old woman who was <ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">[[Torture murder|</ins>tortured and murdered<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">]]</ins> in [[Greensburg, Pennsylvania]] in February 2010.&lt;ref&gt;[http://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2010/02/16/us/AP-US-Disabled-Woman-Torture.html Feds: Pa. Torture Death Might Be Hate Crime], The New York Times, February 16, 2010&lt;/ref&gt;</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"></td>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div>Allegheny County Coroner [[Cyril H. Wecht]], who has conducted and reviewed thousands of autopsies of homicide victims, stated, "... This is one of the most horrific cases I have seen... You have one young, defenseless woman, six people who are keeping her captive and doing all of these things, knowing she is [mentally challenged]. Put it all together, it is bizarre, it is extreme barbarism."&lt;ref&gt;[http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10045/1035865-59.stm How slaying victim came to know her attackers], Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, February 14, 2010&lt;/ref&gt;</div></td>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"></td>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div>Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume detergent and urine, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake suicide note, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.&lt;ref&gt;[http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers], CBS News, February 16, 2010&lt;/ref&gt;</div></td>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>During [[torture]] and abuse sessions, which lasted for a total of more than two days, Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume [[feces]] and [[urine]]&lt;ref&gt;[http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10063/1040265-100.stm 6 held for trial in Greensburg torture, slaying], Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, March 4, 2010&lt;/ref&gt; and [[detergent]], beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake [[suicide note]], and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.&lt;ref&gt;[http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers], CBS News, February 16, 2010&lt;/ref&gt;</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 15:29, 11 March 2010</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-style ambox-Orphan" role="presentation" style="display: none"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><a href="/wiki/File:Wiki_letter_w.svg" class="image"><img alt="Wiki letter w.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/40px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/60px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/80px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="44" data-file-height="44" /></a></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">This article <b>is an <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Orphan" title="Wikipedia:Orphan">orphan</a>, as no other articles <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Whatlinkshere&amp;target=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty&amp;namespace=0">link to it</a></b>. Please <a href="/wiki/Help:Link" title="Help:Link">introduce links</a> to this page from <span class="plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special%3ASearch&amp;redirs=1&amp;search=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty&amp;fulltext=Search&amp;ns0=1&amp;title=Special%3ASearch&amp;advanced=1&amp;fulltext=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty">related articles</a></span>; try the <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//edwardbetts.com/find_link?q=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty">Find link tool</a> for suggestions. <small><i>(March 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-content ambox-Notability" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">The topic of this article <b>may not meet Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Notability_(people)" title="Wikipedia:Notability (people)">notability guideline for biographies</a></b>. <span class="hide-when-compact">Please help to establish notability by adding <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">reliable, secondary sources</a> about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merge" title="Wikipedia:Merge" class="mw-redirect">merged</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Redirect" title="Wikipedia:Redirect">redirected</a>, or <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deleted</a>.<br /> <small><span class="plainlinks"><i>Find sources:</i>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?as_eq=wikipedia&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;num=50">"Murder of Jennifer Daugherty"</a>&#160;–&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;tbm=nws">news</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+site:news.google.com/newspapers&amp;source=newspapers">newspapers</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?tbs=bks:1&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">books</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">scholar</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/action/doBasicSearch?Query=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;acc=on&amp;wc=on">JSTOR</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/images?safe=off&amp;tbm=isch&amp;tbs=sur:fmc&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+-site:wikipedia.org+-site:wikimedia.org">free images</a></span></small></span> <small><i>(February 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Jennifer Daugherty</b> was a 30-year-old woman who was <a href="/wiki/Torture_murder" title="Torture murder" class="mw-redirect">tortured and murdered</a> in <a href="/wiki/Greensburg,_Pennsylvania" title="Greensburg, Pennsylvania">Greensburg, Pennsylvania</a> in February 2010.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>During <a href="/wiki/Torture" title="Torture">torture</a> and abuse sessions, which lasted for a total of more than two days, Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume <a href="/wiki/Feces" title="Feces">feces</a> and <a href="/wiki/Urine" title="Urine">urine</a><sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup> and <a href="/wiki/Detergent" title="Detergent">detergent</a>, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake <a href="/wiki/Suicide_note" title="Suicide note">suicide note</a>, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup> According to her relatives, Daugherty had the mental abilities of a 12 to 14-year-old, she trusted everyone, and she had thought that the suspects were her "friends."<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Allegheny County Coroner <a href="/wiki/Cyril_H._Wecht" title="Cyril H. Wecht" class="mw-redirect">Cyril H. Wecht</a>, who has conducted and reviewed thousands of autopsies of homicide victims, stated, "... This is one of the most horrific cases I have seen... You have one young, defenseless woman, six people who are keeping her captive and doing all of these things, knowing she is [mentally challenged]. Put it all together, it is bizarre, it is extreme barbarism."<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5"><span>[</span>5<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2010/02/16/us/AP-US-Disabled-Woman-Torture.html">Feds: Pa. Torture Death Might Be Hate Crime</a>, The New York Times, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10063/1040265-100.stm">6 held for trial in Greensburg torture, slaying</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, March 4, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml">Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers</a>, CBS News, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/02/12/AR2010021201815.html">Pa. family: 'Friends' torture, kill disabled woman</a>, The Washington Post, February 13, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-5">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10045/1035865-59.stm">How slaying victim came to know her attackers</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, February 14, 2010</span></li> </ol> </div> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" style="background:transparent"> <tr> <td><a href="/wiki/File:Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg" class="image"><img alt="Stub icon" It allows adding a reason in the summary.">undo</a>)</span></strong></div><div id="mw-diff-ntitle2"><a href="/wiki/User:Grundle2600" title="User:Grundle2600" class="mw-userlink">Grundle2600</a> <span class="mw-usertoollinks">(<a href="/wiki/User_talk:Grundle2600" title="User talk:Grundle2600">talk</a> | <a href="/wiki/Special:Contributions/Grundle2600" title="Special:Contributions/Grundle2600">contribs</a>)</span> </div><div id="mw-diff-ntitle3"> <span class="comment">(torture lasted for more than two days)</span></div><div id="mw-diff-ntitle5"></div><div id="mw-diff-ntitle4"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty&amp;diff=next&amp;oldid=347848547" title="Murder of Jennifer Daugherty" id="differences-nextlink">Next edit →</a></div></td> 				</tr><tr><td colspan='4' style='text-align: center;' class='diff-multi'>(2 intermediate revisions by one other user not shown)</td></tr><tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-lineno">Line 6:</td>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-lineno">Line 6:</td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>Allegheny County Coroner [[Cyril H. Put it all together, it is bizarre, it is extreme barbarism."&lt;ref&gt;[http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10045/1035865-59.stm How slaying victim came to know her attackers], Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, February 14, 2010&lt;/ref&gt;</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>Allegheny County Coroner [[Cyril H. Jennifer Daugherty] page at facebook.com</div></td>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:Murder]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:Murder]]</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 04:39, 5 March 2010</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-style ambox-Orphan" role="presentation" style="display: none"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><a href="/wiki/File:Wiki_letter_w.svg" class="image"><img alt="Wiki letter w.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/40px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/60px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/80px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="44" data-file-height="44" /></a></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">This article <b>is an <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Orphan" title="Wikipedia:Orphan">orphan</a>, as no other articles <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Whatlinkshere&amp;target=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty&amp;namespace=0">link to it</a></b>. Please <a href="/wiki/Help:Link" title="Help:Link">introduce links</a> to this page from <span class="plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special%3ASearch&amp;redirs=1&amp;search=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty&amp;fulltext=Search&amp;ns0=1&amp;title=Special%3ASearch&amp;advanced=1&amp;fulltext=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty">related articles</a></span>; try the <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//edwardbetts.com/find_link?q=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty">Find link tool</a> for suggestions. <small><i>(March 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-content ambox-Notability" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">The topic of this article <b>may not meet Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Notability_(people)" title="Wikipedia:Notability (people)">notability guideline for biographies</a></b>. <span class="hide-when-compact">Please help to establish notability by adding <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">reliable, secondary sources</a> about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merge" title="Wikipedia:Merge" class="mw-redirect">merged</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Redirect" title="Wikipedia:Redirect">redirected</a>, or <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deleted</a>.<br /> <small><span class="plainlinks"><i>Find sources:</i>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?as_eq=wikipedia&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;num=50">"Murder of Jennifer Daugherty"</a>&#160;–&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;tbm=nws">news</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+site:news.google.com/newspapers&amp;source=newspapers">newspapers</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?tbs=bks:1&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">books</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">scholar</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/action/doBasicSearch?Query=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;acc=on&amp;wc=on">JSTOR</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/images?safe=off&amp;tbm=isch&amp;tbs=sur:fmc&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+-site:wikipedia.org+-site:wikimedia.org">free images</a></span></small></span> <small><i>(February 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Jennifer Daugherty</b> was a 30 year old woman who was tortured and <b>murdered</b> in <a href="/wiki/Greensburg,_Pennsylvania" title="Greensburg, Pennsylvania">Greensburg, Pennsylvania</a> in February 2010.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Allegheny County Coroner <a href="/wiki/Cyril_H._Wecht" title="Cyril H. Wecht" class="mw-redirect">Cyril H. Wecht</a>, who has conducted and reviewed thousands of autopsies of homicide victims, stated, "... This is one of the most horrific cases I have seen... You have one young, defenseless woman, six people who are keeping her captive and doing all of these things, knowing she is [mentally challenged]. Put it all together, it is bizarre, it is extreme barbarism."<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>During torture and abuse sessions which lasted for a total of more than two days,<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup> Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume detergent and urine, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake suicide note, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>According to her relatives, Daugherty had the mental abilities of a 12 to 14-year-old, she trusted everyone, and she had thought that the suspects were her "friends."<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5"><span>[</span>5<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's murder received international media attention.<sup id="cite_ref-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-6"><span>[</span>6<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2010/02/16/us/AP-US-Disabled-Woman-Torture.html">Feds: Pa. Torture Death Might Be Hate Crime</a>, The New York Times, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10045/1035865-59.stm">How slaying victim came to know her attackers</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, February 14, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10063/1040265-100.stm">6 held for trial in Greensburg torture, slaying</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, March 4, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml">Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers</a>, CBS News, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-5">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/02/12/AR2010021201815.html">Pa. family: 'Friends' torture, kill disabled woman</a>, The Washington Post, February 13, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-6"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-6">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.hln.be/hln/nl/960/Buitenland/article/detail/1068340/2010/02/16/Moeder-van-moordenares-wou-destijds-dochtertje-verkopen-voor-7-350-euro.dhtml">Moeder van moordenares wou destijds dochtertje verkopen voor 7.350 euro</a>, hln.be, 16/02/10</span></li> </ol> </div> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" style="background:transparent"> <tr> <td><a <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{reflist}}</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{reflist}}</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:Murder]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:Murder]]</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 17:25, 4 March 2010</h2> <p>fac</p> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-style ambox-Orphan" role="presentation" style="display: none"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><a href="/wiki/File:Wiki_letter_w.svg" class="image"><img alt="Wiki letter w.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/40px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/60px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/80px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="44" data-file-height="44" /></a></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">This article <b>is an <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Orphan" title="Wikipedia:Orphan">orphan</a>, as no other articles <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Whatlinkshere&amp;target=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty&amp;namespace=0">link to it</a></b>. Please <a href="/wiki/Help:Link" title="Help:Link">introduce links</a> to this page from <span class="plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special%3ASearch&amp;redirs=1&amp;search=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty&amp;fulltext=Search&amp;ns0=1&amp;title=Special%3ASearch&amp;advanced=1&amp;fulltext=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty">related articles</a></span>; try the <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//edwardbetts.com/find_link?q=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty">Find link tool</a> for suggestions. <small><i>(March 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-content ambox-Notability" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">The topic of this article <b>may not meet Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Notability_(people)" title="Wikipedia:Notability (people)">notability guideline for biographies</a></b>. <span class="hide-when-compact">Please help to establish notability by adding <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">reliable, secondary sources</a> about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merge" title="Wikipedia:Merge" class="mw-redirect">merged</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Redirect" title="Wikipedia:Redirect">redirected</a>, or <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deleted</a>.<br /> <small><span class="plainlinks"><i>Find sources:</i>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?as_eq=wikipedia&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;num=50">"Murder of Jennifer Daugherty"</a>&#160;–&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;tbm=nws">news</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+site:news.google.com/newspapers&amp;source=newspapers">newspapers</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?tbs=bks:1&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">books</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">scholar</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/action/doBasicSearch?Query=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;acc=on&amp;wc=on">JSTOR</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/images?safe=off&amp;tbm=isch&amp;tbs=sur:fmc&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+-site:wikipedia.org+-site:wikimedia.org">free images</a></span></small></span> <small><i>(February 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Jennifer Daugherty</b> was a 30 year old woman who was tortured and <b>murdered</b> in <a href="/wiki/Greensburg,_Pennsylvania" title="Greensburg, Pennsylvania">Greensburg, Pennsylvania</a> in February 2010.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Allegheny County Coroner <a href="/wiki/Cyril_H._Wecht" title="Cyril H. Wecht" class="mw-redirect">Cyril H. Wecht</a>, who has conducted and reviewed thousands of autopsies of homicide victims, stated, "... This is one of the most horrific cases I have seen... You have one young, defenseless woman, six people who are keeping her captive and doing all of these things, knowing she is [mentally challenged]. Put it all together, it is bizarre, it is extreme barbarism."<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume detergent and urine, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake suicide note, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>According to her relatives, Daugherty had the mental abilities of a 12 to 14-year-old, she trusted everyone, and she had thought that the suspects were her "friends."<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's murder received international media attention.<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5"><span>[</span>5<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2010/02/16/us/AP-US-Disabled-Woman-Torture.html">Feds: Pa. Torture Death Might Be Hate Crime</a>, The New York Times, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10045/1035865-59.stm">How slaying victim came to know her attackers</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, February 14, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml">Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers</a>, CBS News, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/02/12/AR2010021201815.html">Pa. family: 'Friends' torture, kill disabled woman</a>, The Washington Post, February 13, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-5">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.hln.be/hln/nl/960/Buitenland/article/detail/1068340/2010/02/16/Moeder-van-moordenares-wou-destijds-dochtertje-verkopen-voor-7-350-euro.dhtml">Moeder van moordenares wou destijds dochtertje verkopen voor 7.350 euro</a>, hln.be, 16/02/10</span></li> </ol> </div> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" style="background:transparent"> <tr> <td><a href="/wiki/File:Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg" class="image"><img alt="Stub icon" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/40px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg" width="40" height="20" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/60px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/80px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="300" /></a></td> <td><i>This <a Jennifer Daugherty] page at facebook.com</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:Murder]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:Murder]]</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 02:09, 3 March 2010</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-style ambox-Orphan" role="presentation" style="display: none"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><a href="/wiki/File:Wiki_letter_w.svg" class="image"><img alt="Wiki letter w.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/40px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/60px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/80px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="44" data-file-height="44" /></a></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">This article <b>is an <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Orphan" title="Wikipedia:Orphan">orphan</a>, as no other articles <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Whatlinkshere&amp;target=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty&amp;namespace=0">link to it</a></b>. Please <a href="/wiki/Help:Link" title="Help:Link">introduce links</a> to this page from <span class="plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special%3ASearch&amp;redirs=1&amp;search=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty&amp;fulltext=Search&amp;ns0=1&amp;title=Special%3ASearch&amp;advanced=1&amp;fulltext=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty">related articles</a></span>; try the <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//edwardbetts.com/find_link?q=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty">Find link tool</a> for suggestions. <small><i>(March 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-content ambox-Notability" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">The topic of this article <b>may not meet Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Notability_(people)" title="Wikipedia:Notability (people)">notability guideline for biographies</a></b>. <span class="hide-when-compact">Please help to establish notability by adding <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">reliable, secondary sources</a> about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merge" title="Wikipedia:Merge" class="mw-redirect">merged</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Redirect" title="Wikipedia:Redirect">redirected</a>, or <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deleted</a>.<br /> <small><span class="plainlinks"><i>Find sources:</i>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?as_eq=wikipedia&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;num=50">"Murder of Jennifer Daugherty"</a>&#160;–&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;tbm=nws">news</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+site:news.google.com/newspapers&amp;source=newspapers">newspapers</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?tbs=bks:1&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">books</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">scholar</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/action/doBasicSearch?Query=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;acc=on&amp;wc=on">JSTOR</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/images?safe=off&amp;tbm=isch&amp;tbs=sur:fmc&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+-site:wikipedia.org+-site:wikimedia.org">free images</a></span></small></span> <small><i>(February 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Jennifer Daugherty</b> was a 30 year old woman who was tortured and <b>murdered</b> in <a href="/wiki/Greensburg,_Pennsylvania" title="Greensburg, Pennsylvania">Greensburg, Pennsylvania</a> in February 2010.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Allegheny County Coroner <a href="/wiki/Cyril_H._Wecht" title="Cyril H. Wecht" class="mw-redirect">Cyril H. Wecht</a>, who has conducted and reviewed thousands of autopsies of homicide victims, stated, "... This is one of the most horrific cases I have seen... You have one young, defenseless woman, six people who are keeping her captive and doing all of these things, knowing she is [mentally challenged]. Put it all together, it is bizarre, it is extreme barbarism."<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume detergent and urine, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake suicide note, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>According to her relatives, Daugherty had the mental abilities of a 12 to 14-year-old, she trusted everyone, and she had thought that the suspects were her "friends."<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's murder received international media attention.<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5"><span>[</span>5<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2010/02/16/us/AP-US-Disabled-Woman-Torture.html">Feds: Pa. Torture Death Might Be Hate Crime</a>, The New York Times, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10045/1035865-59.stm">How slaying victim came to know her attackers</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, February 14, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml">Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers</a>, CBS News, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/02/12/AR2010021201815.html">Pa. family: 'Friends' torture, kill disabled woman</a>, The Washington Post, February 13, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-5">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.hln.be/hln/nl/960/Buitenland/article/detail/1068340/2010/02/16/Moeder-van-moordenares-wou-destijds-dochtertje-verkopen-voor-7-350-euro.dhtml">Moeder van moordenares wou destijds dochtertje verkopen voor 7.350 euro</a>, hln.be, 16/02/10</span></li> </ol> </div> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="External_links">External links</span></h2> <ul> <li><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.facebook.com/group.php?v=wall&amp;ref=search&amp;gid=331717294186&amp;_fb_noscript=1">R.I.P. Jennifer Daugherty</a> page at facebook.com</li> </ul> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" style="background:transparent"> <tr> <td><a href="/wiki/File:Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg" class="image"><img alt="Stub icon" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/40px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg" width="40" height="20" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/60px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/80px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="300" /></a></td> <td><i>This <a href="/wiki/Crime" title="Crime">crime</a>-related article is a <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Stub" title="Wikipedia:Stub">stub</a>. You can help Wikipedia by <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty&amp;action=edit">expanding it</a>.</i> <div class="plainlinks hlist navbar <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-style ambox-Orphan" role="presentation" style="display: none"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><a href="/wiki/File:Wiki_letter_w.svg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/60px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/6c/Wiki_letter_w.svg/80px-Wiki_letter_w.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="44" data-file-height="44" /></a></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">This article <b>is an <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Orphan" title="Wikipedia:Orphan">orphan</a>, as no other articles <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Whatlinkshere&amp;target=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty&amp;namespace=0">link to it</a></b>. Please <a href="/wiki/Help:Link" title="Help:Link">introduce links</a> to this page from <span class="plainlinks"><a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special%3ASearch&amp;redirs=1&amp;search=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty&amp;fulltext=Search&amp;ns0=1&amp;title=Special%3ASearch&amp;advanced=1&amp;fulltext=Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty">related articles</a></span>; try the <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//edwardbetts.com/find_link?q=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty">Find link tool</a> for suggestions. <small><i>(March 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-content ambox-Notability" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">The topic of this article <b>may not meet Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Notability_(people)" title="Wikipedia:Notability (people)">notability guideline for biographies</a></b>. <span class="hide-when-compact">Please help to establish notability by adding <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">reliable, secondary sources</a> about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merge" title="Wikipedia:Merge" class="mw-redirect">merged</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Redirect" title="Wikipedia:Redirect">redirected</a>, or <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deleted</a>.<br /> <small><span class="plainlinks"><i>Find sources:</i>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?as_eq=wikipedia&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;num=50">"Murder of Jennifer Daugherty"</a>&#160;–&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;tbm=nws">news</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+site:news.google.com/newspapers&amp;source=newspapers">newspapers</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?tbs=bks:1&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">books</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">scholar</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/action/doBasicSearch?Query=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;acc=on&amp;wc=on">JSTOR</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/images?safe=off&amp;tbm=isch&amp;tbs=sur:fmc&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+-site:wikipedia.org+-site:wikimedia.org">free images</a></span></small></span> <small><i>(February 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Jennifer Daugherty</b> was a 30 year old woman who was tortured and <b>murdered</b> in <a href="/wiki/Greensburg,_Pennsylvania" title="Greensburg, Pennsylvania">Greensburg, Pennsylvania</a> in February 2010.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Allegheny County Coroner <a href="/wiki/Cyril_H._Wecht" title="Cyril H. Wecht" class="mw-redirect">Cyril H. Wecht</a>, who has conducted and reviewed thousands of autopsies of homicide victims, stated, "... This is one of the most horrific cases I have seen... You have one young, defenseless woman, six people who are keeping her captive and doing all of these things, knowing she is [mentally challenged]. Put it all together, it is bizarre, it is extreme barbarism."<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume detergent and urine, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake suicide note, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>According to her relatives, Daugherty had the mental abilities of a 12 to 14-year-old, she trusted everyone, and she had thought that the suspects were her "friends."<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's murder received international media attention.<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5"><span>[</span>5<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2010/02/16/us/AP-US-Disabled-Woman-Torture.html">Feds: Pa. Torture Death Might Be Hate Crime</a>, The New York Times, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10045/1035865-59.stm">How slaying victim came to know her attackers</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, February 14, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml">Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers</a>, CBS News, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/02/12/AR2010021201815.html">Pa. family: 'Friends' torture, kill disabled woman</a>, The Washington Post, February 13, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-5">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.hln.be/hln/nl/960/Buitenland/article/detail/1068340/2010/02/16/Moeder-van-moordenares-wou-destijds-dochtertje-verkopen-voor-7-350-euro.dhtml">Moeder van moordenares wou destijds dochtertje verkopen voor 7.350 euro</a>, hln.be, 16/02/10</span></li> </ol> </div> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" style="background:transparent"> <tr> <td><a href="/wiki/File:Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg" class="image"><img alt="Stub icon" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/40px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg" width="40" height="20" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/60px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/80px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="300" /></a></td> <td><i>This <a class="diff-context"><div>Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume detergent and urine, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake suicide note, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.&lt;ref&gt;[http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers], CBS News, February 16, 2010&lt;/ref&gt;</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume detergent and urine, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake suicide note, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.&lt;ref&gt;[http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers], CBS News, February 16, 2010&lt;/ref&gt;</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>==References==</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 20:18, 24 February 2010</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-content ambox-Notability" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">The topic of this article <b>may not meet Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Notability_(people)" title="Wikipedia:Notability (people)">notability guideline for biographies</a></b>. <span class="hide-when-compact">Please help to establish notability by adding <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">reliable, secondary sources</a> about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merge" title="Wikipedia:Merge" class="mw-redirect">merged</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Redirect" title="Wikipedia:Redirect">redirected</a>, or <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deleted</a>.<br /> <small><span class="plainlinks"><i>Find sources:</i>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?as_eq=wikipedia&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;num=50">"Murder of Jennifer Daugherty"</a>&#160;–&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;tbm=nws">news</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+site:news.google.com/newspapers&amp;source=newspapers">newspapers</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?tbs=bks:1&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">books</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">scholar</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/action/doBasicSearch?Query=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;acc=on&amp;wc=on">JSTOR</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/images?safe=off&amp;tbm=isch&amp;tbs=sur:fmc&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+-site:wikipedia.org+-site:wikimedia.org">free images</a></span></small></span> <small><i>(February 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Jennifer Daugherty</b> was a 30 year old woman who was tortured and <b>murdered</b> in <a href="/wiki/Greensburg,_Pennsylvania" title="Greensburg, Pennsylvania">Greensburg, Pennsylvania</a> in February 2010.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Allegheny County Coroner <a href="/wiki/Cyril_H._Wecht" title="Cyril H. Wecht" class="mw-redirect">Cyril H. Wecht</a>, who has conducted and reviewed thousands of autopsies of homicide victims, stated, "... This is one of the most horrific cases I have seen... You have one young, defenseless woman, six people who are keeping her captive and doing all of these things, knowing she is [mentally challenged]. Put it all together, it is bizarre, it is extreme barbarism."<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume detergent and urine, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake suicide note, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>According to her relatives, Daugherty had the mental abilities of a 12 to 14-year-old, she trusted everyone, and she had thought that the suspects were her "friends."<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's murder received international media attention.<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5"><span>[</span>5<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2010/02/16/us/AP-US-Disabled-Woman-Torture.html">Feds: Pa. Torture Death Might Be Hate Crime</a>, The New York Times, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10045/1035865-59.stm">How slaying victim came to know her attackers</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, February 14, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.cbsnews.com/blogs/2010/02/16/crimesider/entry6212578.shtml">Jennifer Daugherty, Mentally Disabled Woman, Trusted Everyone, Including Her Killers</a>, CBS News, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/02/12/AR2010021201815.html">Pa. family: 'Friends' torture, kill disabled woman</a>, The Washington Post, February 13, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-5">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.hln.be/hln/nl/960/Buitenland/article/detail/1068340/2010/02/16/Moeder-van-moordenares-wou-destijds-dochtertje-verkopen-voor-7-350-euro.dhtml">Moeder van moordenares wou destijds dochtertje verkopen voor 7.350 euro</a>, hln.be, 16/02/10</span></li> </ol> </div> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" style="background:transparent"> <tr> <td><a href="/wiki/File:Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg" class="image"><img alt="Stub icon" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/40px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg" width="40" height="20" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/60px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg/80px-Standard_legirons_taiwan01.jpg 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="300" /></a></td> <td><i>This <a You can help Wikipedia by <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty&amp;action=edit">expanding it</a>.</i> <div class="plainlinks hlist navbar mini" style="position: absolute; right: 15px; display: none;"> <ul> <li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Crime-stub" title="Template:Crime-stub"><span title="View this template">v</span></a></li> <li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Crime-stub" title="Template talk:Crime-stub"><span title="Discuss this template">t</span></a></li> <li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Crime-stub&amp;action=edit"><span title="Edit this template">e</span></a></li> </ul> </div> </td> </tr> </table>   <!--  NewPP limit report Parsed by mw1042 CPU time usage: 0.154 seconds Real time usage: 0.210 seconds Preprocessor visited node count: 207/1000000 Preprocessor generated node count: 0/1500000 Post‐expand include size: 11792/2097152 bytes Template argument size: 24/2097152 bytes Highest expansion depth: 7/40 Expensive parser function count: 1/500 Lua time usage: 0.050/10.000 seconds Lua memory usage: 1.51 MB/50 MB -->  <!--  Transclusion expansion time report (%,ms,calls,template) 100.00%  130.031      1 - -total  75.55%   98.234      1 - Template:Notability  57.23%   74.412      1 - Template:Ambox  26.85%   34.916      1 - Template:Find_sources_mainspace  12.64%   16.437      1 - Template:Crime-stub  11.03%   14.346      1 - Template:Asbox   6.53%    8.490      1 - Template:Reflist --> <noscript><img src="//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:CentralAutoLogin/start?type=1x1" alt="" title="" width="1" height="1" style="border: none; class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{reflist}}</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{reflist}}</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div><del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">{{stub}}</del></div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div></div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:Murder]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:Murder]]</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>{{crime-stub}}</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 09:54, 18 February 2010</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-delete" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-empty-cell"></td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span"><b>This article is being considered for deletion in accordance with Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deletion policy</a>.</b><br /> Please share your thoughts on the matter at <b><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Articles_for_deletion/Murder_of_Jennifer_Daugherty" title="Wikipedia:Articles for deletion/Murder of Jennifer Daugherty">this article's entry</a></b> on the <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Articles_for_deletion" title="Wikipedia:Articles for deletion">Articles for deletion</a> page.<br /> Feel free to edit the article, but the article <b>must not</b> be blanked, and this notice <b>must not</b> be removed, until the discussion is closed. For more information, particularly on merging or moving the article during the discussion, read the <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Guide_to_deletion" title="Wikipedia:Guide to deletion">guide to deletion</a>.<span id="delete-reason" style="display:none;">%5B%5BWikipedia%3AArticles+for+deletion%2FMurder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%5D%5D</span><span id="delete-criterion" style="display:none;">AFD</span></span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-content ambox-Notability" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">The topic of this article <b>may not meet Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Notability_(people)" title="Wikipedia:Notability (people)">notability guideline for biographies</a></b>. <span class="hide-when-compact">Please help to establish notability by adding <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">reliable, secondary sources</a> about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merge" title="Wikipedia:Merge" class="mw-redirect">merged</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Redirect" title="Wikipedia:Redirect">redirected</a>, or <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deleted</a>.<br /> <small><span class="plainlinks"><i>Find sources:</i>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?as_eq=wikipedia&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;num=50">"Murder of Jennifer Daugherty"</a>&#160;–&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;tbm=nws">news</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+site:news.google.com/newspapers&amp;source=newspapers">newspapers</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?tbs=bks:1&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">books</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22">scholar</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/action/doBasicSearch?Query=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22&amp;acc=on&amp;wc=on">JSTOR</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/images?safe=off&amp;tbm=isch&amp;tbs=sur:fmc&amp;q=%22Murder+of+Jennifer+Daugherty%22+-site:wikipedia.org+-site:wikimedia.org">free images</a></span></small></span> <small><i>(February 2010)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Jennifer Daugherty</b> was a 30 year old woman who was tortured and <b>murdered</b> in <a href="/wiki/Greensburg,_Pennsylvania" title="Greensburg, Pennsylvania">Greensburg, Pennsylvania</a> in February 2010.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Allegheny County Coroner <a href="/wiki/Cyril_H._Wecht" title="Cyril H. Wecht" class="mw-redirect">Cyril H. Wecht</a>, who has conducted and reviewed thousands of autopsies of homicide victims, stated, "... This is one of the most horrific cases I have seen... You have one young, defenseless woman, six people who are keeping her captive and doing all of these things, knowing she is [mentally challenged]. Put it all together, it is bizarre, it is extreme barbarism."<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's attackers tied her up, forced her to consume detergent and urine, beat her with a towel rack, a vacuum cleaner hose, and a crutch, shaved her head, painted her face with nail polish, forced her to write a fake suicide note, and then stabbed her to death. Six suspects were charged with criminal homicide, kidnapping and other counts related to her death.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Daugherty's murder received international media attention.<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.nytimes.com/aponline/2010/02/16/us/AP-US-Disabled-Woman-Torture.html">Feds: Pa. Torture Death Might Be Hate Crime</a>, The New York Times, February 16, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.post-gazette.com/pg/10045/1035865-59.stm">How slaying victim came to know her attackers</a>, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, February 14, 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-3"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" 2010</span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" dochtertje verkopen voor 7.350 euro</a>, hln.be, 16/02/10</span></li> </ol> </div> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" style="background:transparent"> <tr> <td><a
