9 February 2009) was an [[England|English]] [[association football]] player, who played as a [[forward (association football)|forward]].</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>'''Marc Burrows''' (1978 &amp;ndash; 9 February 2009) was an [[England|English]] [[association football]] player, who played as a [[forward (association football)|forward]].</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 18:43, 1 March 2009</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-move" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/aa/Merge-arrow.svg/50px-Merge-arrow.svg.png" width="50" height="20" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/aa/Merge-arrow.svg/75px-Merge-arrow.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/aa/Merge-arrow.svg/100px-Merge-arrow.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="50" data-file-height="20" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">It has been suggested that this article be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merging" title="Wikipedia:Merging">merged</a> into <i><a href="/wiki/Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Cowes Sports F.C.">Cowes Sports F.C.</a></i> and <i><strong class="selflink">Talk:Marc Burrows#Merge article</strong></i>. (<a href="/wiki/Talk:Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Talk:Cowes Sports F.C.">Discuss</a>) <small><i>Proposed since March 2009.</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Marc Burrows</b> (1978 – 9 February 2009) was an <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">English</a> <a href="/wiki/Association_football" title="Association football">association football</a> player, who played as a <a href="/wiki/Forward_(association_football)" title="Forward (association football)">forward</a>.</p> <p>After beginning his career as a trainee at <a href="/wiki/Portsmouth_F.C." title="Portsmouth F.C.">Portsmouth</a>, Burrows played for non-league clubs <a href="/wiki/Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Cowes Sports F.C.">Cowes Sports F.C.</a> and <a href="/wiki/Christchurch_F.C." title="Christchurch F.C.">Christchurch F.C.</a></p> <p>Although his playing career was not notable, Burrows is recognised as scoring the sport's fastest ever goal, beating both the former English record of <a href="/wiki/Colin_Cowperthwaite" title="Colin Cowperthwaite">Colin Cowperthwaite</a> (3.5 seconds) and the world record held by <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ricardo_Olivera&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ricardo Olivera (page does not exist)">Ricardo Olivera</a> (2.8 seconds). The record was set in a match against <a href="/wiki/Eastleigh_F.C." title="Eastleigh F.C.">Eastleigh F.C.</a> in 2004, when Burrows spotted the goalkeeper off his line and shot straight from kick-off. With the wind behind it the ball landed in the goal, and was recorded by the match referee at 2.0 seconds. The <a href="/wiki/Football_Association" title="Football Association" class="mw-redirect">Football Association</a> later confirmed this goal was a world record for the sport.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Burrows died aged 30 on 9 February 2009<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup>, after being diagnosed with cancer.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup> <sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/hampshire/dorset/3606977.stm">Footballer's 'fastest ever' goal</a></span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" and [[Christchurch F.C.]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>After beginning his career as a trainee at [[Portsmouth F.C.|Portsmouth]], Burrows played for non-league clubs [[Cowes Sports F.C.]] and [[Christchurch F.C.]]</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-lineno">Line 13:</td>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-lineno">Line 12:</td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{DEFAULTSORT:Burrows, Marc}}</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{DEFAULTSORT:Burrows, Marc}}</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div>[[Category:<del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">1979</del> births]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>[[Category:<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">1978</ins> births]]</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:2009 deaths]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:2009 deaths]]</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:English footballers]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:English footballers]]</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 06:46, 26 February 2009</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-move" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/aa/Merge-arrow.svg/50px-Merge-arrow.svg.png" width="50" height="20" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/aa/Merge-arrow.svg/75px-Merge-arrow.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/aa/Merge-arrow.svg/100px-Merge-arrow.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="50" data-file-height="20" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">It has been suggested that this article be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merging" title="Wikipedia:Merging">merged</a> into <i><a href="/wiki/Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Cowes Sports F.C.">Cowes Sports F.C.</a></i> and <i><strong class="selflink">Talk:Marc Burrows#Merge article</strong></i>. (<a href="/wiki/Talk:Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Talk:Cowes Sports F.C.">Discuss</a>)</span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Marc Burrows</b> (1978 – 9 February 2009) was an <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">English</a> <a href="/wiki/Association_football" title="Association football">association football</a> player, who played as a <a href="/wiki/Forward_(association_football)" title="Forward (association football)">forward</a>.</p> <p>After beginning his career as a trainee at <a href="/wiki/Portsmouth_F.C." title="Portsmouth F.C.">Portsmouth</a>, Burrows played for non-league clubs <a href="/wiki/Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Cowes Sports F.C.">Cowes Sports F.C.</a> and <a href="/wiki/Christchurch_F.C." title="Christchurch F.C.">Christchurch F.C.</a></p> <p>Although his playing career was not notable, Burrows is recognised as scoring the sport's fastest ever goal, beating both the former English record of <a href="/wiki/Colin_Cowperthwaite" title="Colin Cowperthwaite">Colin Cowperthwaite</a> (3.5 seconds) and the world record held by <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ricardo_Olivera&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ricardo Olivera (page does not exist)">Ricardo Olivera</a> (2.8 seconds). The record was set in a match against <a href="/wiki/Eastleigh_F.C." title="Eastleigh F.C.">Eastleigh F.C.</a> in 2004, when Burrows spotted the goalkeeper off his line and shot straight from kick-off. With the wind behind it the ball landed in the goal, and was recorded by the match referee at 2.0 seconds. The <a href="/wiki/Football_Association" title="Football Association" class="mw-redirect">Football Association</a> later confirmed this goal was a world record for the sport.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Burrows died aged 30 on 9 February 2009<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup>, after being diagnosed with cancer.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup> <sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.thefa.com/GrassrootsOld/GrassRootsNews/Postings/2004/04/A_goal_after_two_seconds.htm">A goal after two seconds</a></span></li> <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/hampshire/dorset/3606977.stm">Footballer's 'fastest ever' goal</a></span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/7890299.stm">Fastest football goal scorer dies</a></span></li> </ol> </div> <p><br /></p> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" footballers]]</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 20:19, 23 February 2009</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-notice" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><a href="/wiki/File:Ambox_current_red.svg" class="image"><img alt="Ambox current red.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/40px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png" width="40" height="32" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/60px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/80px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="360" data-file-height="290" /></a></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">This article <b>is about <a href="/wiki/Deaths_in_2015" title="Deaths in 2015">a person who has recently died</a></b>. Some information, such as the circumstances of the person's death and surrounding events, may change as more facts become known. Initial news reports may be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources#Breaking_news" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">unreliable</a>.</span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-move" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/aa/Merge-arrow.svg/50px-Merge-arrow.svg.png" width="50" height="20" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/aa/Merge-arrow.svg/75px-Merge-arrow.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/aa/Merge-arrow.svg/100px-Merge-arrow.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="50" data-file-height="20" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">It has been suggested that this article be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merging" title="Wikipedia:Merging">merged</a> into <i><a href="/wiki/Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Cowes Sports F.C.">Cowes Sports F.C.</a></i> and <i><strong class="selflink">Talk:Marc Burrows#Merge article</strong></i>. (<a href="/wiki/Talk:Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Talk:Cowes Sports F.C.">Discuss</a>)</span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Marc Burrows</b> (1978 – 9 February 2009) was an <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">English</a> <a href="/wiki/Association_football" title="Association football">association football</a> player, who played as a <a href="/wiki/Forward_(association_football)" title="Forward (association football)">forward</a>.</p> <p>After beginning his career as a trainee at <a href="/wiki/Portsmouth_F.C." title="Portsmouth F.C.">Portsmouth</a>, Burrows played for non-league clubs <a href="/wiki/Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Cowes Sports F.C.">Cowes Sports F.C.</a> and <a href="/wiki/Christchurch_F.C." title="Christchurch F.C.">Christchurch F.C.</a></p> <p>Although his playing career was not notable, Burrows is recognised as scoring the sport's fastest ever goal, beating both the former English record of <a href="/wiki/Colin_Cowperthwaite" title="Colin Cowperthwaite">Colin Cowperthwaite</a> (3.5 seconds) and the world record held by <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ricardo_Olivera&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ricardo Olivera (page does not exist)">Ricardo Olivera</a> (2.8 seconds). The record was set in a match against <a href="/wiki/Eastleigh_F.C." title="Eastleigh F.C.">Eastleigh F.C.</a> in 2004, when Burrows spotted the goalkeeper off his line and shot straight from kick-off. With the wind behind it the ball landed in the goal, and was recorded by the match referee at 2.0 seconds. The <a href="/wiki/Football_Association" title="Football Association" class="mw-redirect">Football Association</a> later confirmed this goal was a world record for the sport.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Burrows died aged 30 on 9 February 2009<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup>, after being diagnosed with cancer.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup> <sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/hampshire/dorset/3606977.stm">Footballer's 'fastest ever' goal</a></span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{reflist}}</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{reflist}}</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>{{England-footy-bio-stub}}</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 06:53, 20 February 2009</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-content ambox-Notability" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">The topic of this article <b>may not meet Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Notability" title="Wikipedia:Notability">general notability guideline</a></b>. <span class="hide-when-compact">Please help to establish notability by adding <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">reliable, secondary sources</a> about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merge" title="Wikipedia:Merge" class="mw-redirect">merged</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Redirect" title="Wikipedia:Redirect">redirected</a>, or <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deleted</a>.<br /> <small><span class="plainlinks"><i>Find sources:</i>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?as_eq=wikipedia&amp;q=%22Marc+Burrows%22&amp;num=50">"Marc Burrows"</a>&#160;–&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?q=%22Marc+Burrows%22&amp;tbm=nws">news</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?&amp;q=%22Marc+Burrows%22+site:news.google.com/newspapers&amp;source=newspapers">newspapers</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?tbs=bks:1&amp;q=%22Marc+Burrows%22">books</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%22Marc+Burrows%22">scholar</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/action/doBasicSearch?Query=%22Marc+Burrows%22&amp;acc=on&amp;wc=on">JSTOR</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/images?safe=off&amp;tbm=isch&amp;tbs=sur:fmc&amp;q=%22Marc+Burrows%22+-site:wikipedia.org+-site:wikimedia.org">free images</a></span></small></span> <small><i>(February 2009)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-notice" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><a href="/wiki/File:Ambox_current_red.svg" class="image"><img alt="Ambox current red.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/40px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png" width="40" height="32" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/60px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/80px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="360" data-file-height="290" /></a></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">This article <b>is about <a href="/wiki/Deaths_in_2015" title="Deaths in 2015">a person who has recently died</a></b>. Some information, such as the circumstances of the person's death and surrounding events, may change as more facts become known. Initial news reports may be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources#Breaking_news" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">unreliable</a>.</span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Marc Burrows</b> (1979 – 9 February 2009) was an <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">English</a> <a href="/wiki/Association_football" title="Association football">association football</a> player, who played as a <a href="/wiki/Forward_(association_football)" title="Forward (association football)">forward</a>.</p> <p>After beginning his career as a trainee at <a href="/wiki/Portsmouth_F.C." title="Portsmouth F.C.">Portsmouth</a>, Burrows played for non-league clubs <a href="/wiki/Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Cowes Sports F.C.">Cowes Sports F.C.</a> and <a href="/wiki/Christchurch_F.C." title="Christchurch F.C.">Christchurch F.C.</a></p> <p>Although his playing career was not notable, Burrows is recognised as scoring the sport's fastest ever goal, beating both the former English record of <a href="/wiki/Colin_Cowperthwaite" title="Colin Cowperthwaite">Colin Cowperthwaite</a> (3.5 seconds) and the world record held by <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ricardo_Olivera&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ricardo Olivera (page does not exist)">Ricardo Olivera</a> (2.8 seconds). The record was set in a match against <a href="/wiki/Eastleigh_F.C." title="Eastleigh F.C.">Eastleigh F.C.</a> in 2004, when Burrows spotted the goalkeeper off his line and shot straight from kick-off. With the wind behind it the ball landed in the goal, and was recorded by the match referee at 2.0 seconds. The <a href="/wiki/Football_Association" title="Football Association" class="mw-redirect">Football Association</a> later confirmed this goal was a world record for the sport.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Burrows died aged 30 on 9 February 2009<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup>, after being diagnosed with cancer.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup> <sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/hampshire/dorset/3606977.stm">Footballer's 'fastest ever' goal</a></span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/7890299.stm">Fastest football goal scorer dies</a></span></li> </ol> </div> <p><br /></p> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>{{Notability|date=February 2009}}</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>{{Recent death|date=February 2009}}</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>'''Marc Burrows''' (1979 &amp;ndash; 9 February 2009) was an [[England|English]] [[association football]] player, who played as a [[forward (association football)|forward]].</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div>After beginning his career as a trainee at [[Portsmouth F.C.]], Burrows played for non-league clubs [[Cowes Sports F.C.]] and [[Christchurch F.C.]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>After beginning his career as a trainee at [[Portsmouth F.C.<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">|Portsmouth</ins>]], Burrows played for non-league clubs [[Cowes Sports F.C.]] and [[Christchurch F.C.]]</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div>Although his playing career was not notable, Burrows is recognised as scoring the sport's fastest ever goal, beating both the former English record of [[Colin Cowperthwaite]] (3.5 seconds) and the world record held by [[Ricardo Olivera]] (2.8 seconds). The record was set in a match against [[Eastleigh F.C.]] in 2004, when Burrows spotted the goalkeeper off his line and shot straight from kick-off. With the wind behind it the ball landed in the goal, and was recorded by the match referee at 2.0 seconds. The [[Football Association]] later confirmed this goal was a world record for the sport.</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>Although his playing career was not notable, Burrows is recognised as scoring the sport's fastest ever goal, beating both the former English record of [[Colin Cowperthwaite]] (3.5 seconds) and the world record held by [[Ricardo Olivera]] (2.8 seconds). The record was set in a match against [[Eastleigh F.C.]] in 2004, when Burrows spotted the goalkeeper off his line and shot straight from kick-off. With the wind behind it the ball landed in the goal, and was recorded by the match referee at 2.0 seconds. The [[Football Association]] later confirmed this goal was a world record for the sport.<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">&lt;ref&gt;[http://www.thefa.com/GrassrootsOld/GrassRootsNews/Postings/2004/04/A_goal_after_two_seconds.htm A goal after two seconds]&lt;/ref&gt;</ins></div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div>Burrows died aged 30 on February<del class="diffchange diffchange-inline"> 14</del> 2009, after being diagnosed with cancer.&lt;ref&gt;http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/hampshire/dorset/3606977.stm&lt;/ref&gt; &lt;ref&gt;http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/7890299.stm&lt;/ref&gt;</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>Burrows died aged 30 on<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline"> 9</ins> February 2009<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">&lt;ref&gt;[http://www.dailyecho.co.uk/search/4113831.Tragic_death_of_non_league_striker/ Tragic death of non-league striker]&lt;/ref&gt;</ins>, after being diagnosed with cancer.&lt;ref&gt;<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">[</ins>http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/hampshire/dorset/3606977.stm<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline"> Footballer's 'fastest ever' goal]</ins>&lt;/ref&gt; &lt;ref&gt;<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">[</ins>http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/7890299.stm<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline"> Fastest football goal scorer dies] </ins>&lt;/ref&gt;</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>==References==</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 14:56, 16 February 2009</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-delete" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-empty-cell"></td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span"><b>This article is being considered for deletion in accordance with Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deletion policy</a>.</b><br /> Please share your thoughts on the matter at <b><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Articles_for_deletion/Marc_Burrows" title="Wikipedia:Articles for deletion/Marc Burrows">this article's entry</a></b> on the <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Articles_for_deletion" title="Wikipedia:Articles for deletion">Articles for deletion</a> page.<br /> Feel free to edit the article, but the article <b>must not</b> be blanked, and this notice <b>must not</b> be removed, until the discussion is closed. For more information, particularly on merging or moving the article during the discussion, read the <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Guide_to_deletion" title="Wikipedia:Guide to deletion">guide to deletion</a>.<span id="delete-reason" style="display:none;">%5B%5BWikipedia%3AArticles+for+deletion%2FMarc+Burrows%5D%5D</span><span id="delete-criterion" style="display:none;">AFD</span></span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-content ambox-Notability" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/40px-Ambox_important.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/60px-Ambox_important.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Ambox_important.svg/80px-Ambox_important.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="40" data-file-height="40" /></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">The topic of this article <b>may not meet Wikipedia's <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Notability" title="Wikipedia:Notability">general notability guideline</a></b>. <span class="hide-when-compact">Please help to establish notability by adding <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">reliable, secondary sources</a> about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Merge" title="Wikipedia:Merge" class="mw-redirect">merged</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Redirect" title="Wikipedia:Redirect">redirected</a>, or <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Deletion_policy" title="Wikipedia:Deletion policy">deleted</a>.<br /> <small><span class="plainlinks"><i>Find sources:</i>&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?as_eq=wikipedia&amp;q=%22Marc+Burrows%22&amp;num=50">"Marc Burrows"</a>&#160;–&#160;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?q=%22Marc+Burrows%22&amp;tbm=nws">news</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?&amp;q=%22Marc+Burrows%22+site:news.google.com/newspapers&amp;source=newspapers">newspapers</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/search?tbs=bks:1&amp;q=%22Marc+Burrows%22">books</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//scholar.google.com/scholar?q=%22Marc+Burrows%22">scholar</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/action/doBasicSearch?Query=%22Marc+Burrows%22&amp;acc=on&amp;wc=on">JSTOR</a>&#160;<b>·</b> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.google.com/images?safe=off&amp;tbm=isch&amp;tbs=sur:fmc&amp;q=%22Marc+Burrows%22+-site:wikipedia.org+-site:wikimedia.org">free images</a></span></small></span> <small><i>(February 2009)</i></small></span></td> </tr> </table> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-notice" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><a href="/wiki/File:Ambox_current_red.svg" class="image"><img alt="Ambox current red.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/40px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png" width="40" height="32" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/60px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/80px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="360" data-file-height="290" /></a></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">This article <b>is about <a href="/wiki/Deaths_in_2015" title="Deaths in 2015">a person who has recently died</a></b>. Some information, such as the circumstances of the person's death and surrounding events, may change as more facts become known. Initial news reports may be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources#Breaking_news" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">unreliable</a>.</span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Marc Burrows</b> (1979 – 9 February 2009) was an <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">English</a> <a href="/wiki/Association_football" title="Association football">association football</a> player, who played as a <a href="/wiki/Forward_(association_football)" title="Forward (association football)">forward</a>.</p> <p>After beginning his career as a trainee at <a href="/wiki/Portsmouth_F.C." title="Portsmouth F.C.">Portsmouth</a>, Burrows played for non-league clubs <a href="/wiki/Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Cowes Sports F.C.">Cowes Sports F.C.</a> and <a href="/wiki/Christchurch_F.C." title="Christchurch F.C.">Christchurch F.C.</a></p> <p>Although his playing career was not notable, Burrows is recognised as scoring the sport's fastest ever goal, beating both the former English record of <a href="/wiki/Colin_Cowperthwaite" title="Colin Cowperthwaite">Colin Cowperthwaite</a> (3.5 seconds) and the world record held by <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ricardo_Olivera&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ricardo Olivera (page does not exist)">Ricardo Olivera</a> (2.8 seconds). The record was set in a match against <a href="/wiki/Eastleigh_F.C." title="Eastleigh F.C.">Eastleigh F.C.</a> in 2004, when Burrows spotted the goalkeeper off his line and shot straight from kick-off. With the wind behind it the ball landed in the goal, and was recorded by the match referee at 2.0 seconds. The <a href="/wiki/Football_Association" title="Football Association" class="mw-redirect">Football Association</a> later confirmed this goal was a world record for the sport.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <p>Burrows died aged 30 on 9 February 2009<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup>, after being diagnosed with cancer.<sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3"><span>[</span>3<span>]</span></a></sup> <sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4"><span>[</span>4<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" href="#cite_ref-3">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/hampshire/dorset/3606977.stm">Footballer's 'fastest ever' goal</a></span></li> <li id="cite_note-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-4">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>Although his playing career was not notable, Burrows is recognised as scoring the sport's fastest ever goal, beating both the former English record of [[Colin Cowperthwaite]] (3.5 seconds) and the world record held by [[Ricardo Olivera]] (2.8 seconds). The record was set in a match against [[Eastleigh F.C.]] in 2004, when Burrows spotted the goalkeeper off his line and shot straight from kick-off. With the wind behind it the ball landed in the goal, and was recorded by the match referee at 2.0 seconds. The [[Football Association]] later confirmed this goal was a world record for the sport.</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>Although his playing career was not notable, Burrows is recognised as scoring the sport's fastest ever goal, beating both the former English record of [[Colin Cowperthwaite]] (3.5 seconds) and the world record held by [[Ricardo Olivera]] (2.8 seconds). The record was set in a match against [[Eastleigh F.C.]] in 2004, when Burrows spotted the goalkeeper off his line and shot straight from kick-off. With the wind behind it the ball landed in the goal, and was recorded by the match referee at 2.0 seconds. The [[Football Association]] later confirmed this goal was a world record for the sport.</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div>Burrows died aged 30 on<del class="diffchange </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>==References==</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>==References==</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-lineno">Line 17:</td>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-lineno">Line 17:</td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:2009 deaths]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:2009 deaths]]</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:English footballers]]</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>[[Category:English footballers]]</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>[[Category:Deaths from cancer]]</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 09:45, 15 February 2009</h2> <table class="metadata plainlinks ambox ambox-notice" role="presentation"> <tr> <td class="mbox-image"> <div style="width:52px"><a href="/wiki/File:Ambox_current_red.svg" class="image"><img alt="Ambox current red.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/40px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png" width="40" height="32" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/60px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/98/Ambox_current_red.svg/80px-Ambox_current_red.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="360" data-file-height="290" /></a></div> </td> <td class="mbox-text"><span class="mbox-text-span">This article <b>is about <a href="/wiki/Deaths_in_2015" title="Deaths in 2015">a person who has recently died</a></b>. Some information, such as the circumstances of the person's death and surrounding events, may change as more facts become known. Initial news reports may be <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources#Breaking_news" title="Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources">unreliable</a>.</span></td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Marc Burrows</b> (1979–2009) was an <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">English</a> <a href="/wiki/Association_football" title="Association football">association football</a> player.</p> <p>After beginning his career as a trainee at <a href="/wiki/Portsmouth_F.C." title="Portsmouth F.C.">Portsmouth</a>, Burrows played for non-league clubs <a href="/wiki/Cowes_Sports_F.C." title="Cowes Sports F.C.">Cowes Sports F.C.</a> and <a href="/wiki/Christchurch_F.C." title="Christchurch F.C.">Christchurch F.C.</a></p> <p>Although his playing career was not notable, Burrows is recognised as scoring the sport's fastest ever goal, beating both the former English record of <a href="/wiki/Colin_Cowperthwaite" title="Colin Cowperthwaite">Colin Cowperthwaite</a> (3.5 seconds) and the world record held by <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ricardo_Olivera&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ricardo Olivera (page does not exist)">Ricardo Olivera</a> (2.8 seconds). The record was set in a match against <a href="/wiki/Eastleigh_F.C." title="Eastleigh F.C.">Eastleigh F.C.</a> in 2004, when Burrows spotted the goalkeeper off his line and shot straight from kick-off. With the wind behind it the ball landed in the goal, and was recorded by the match referee at 2.0 seconds. The <a href="/wiki/Football_Association" title="Football Association" class="mw-redirect">Football Association</a> later confirmed this goal was a world record for the sport.</p> <p>Burrows died aged 30 on 14 February 2009, after being diagnosed with cancer.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-1"><span>[</span>1<span>]</span></a></sup> <sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2"><span>[</span>2<span>]</span></a></sup></p> <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="References">References</span></h2> <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: decimal;"> <ol class="references"> <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/hampshire/dorset/3606977.stm">Footballer's 'fastest ever' goal</a></span></li> <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/7890299.stm">Fastest football goal scorer dies</a></span></li> </ol> </div> <table class="metadata plainlinks stub" role="presentation" style="background:transparent"> <tr> <td><span style="vertical-align: middle; background:transparent"><a href="/wiki/File:Flag_of_England.svg" class="image"><img alt="Flag of England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/40px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" width="40" height="24" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/60px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/80px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a><span style="margin-left:-40px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Soccerball_mask.svg" class="image"><img alt="Soccer icon" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4e/Soccerball_mask.svg/40px-Soccerball_mask.svg.png" width="40" height="40" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4e/Soccerball_mask.svg/60px-Soccerball_mask.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4e/Soccerball_mask.svg/80px-Soccerball_mask.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="313" data-file-height="313" /></a></span></span></td> <td><i>This biographical article related to English football is a <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Stub" title="Wikipedia:Stub">stub</a>. text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span style="font-weight:normal">1996-1998<br /> 1998-2002<br /> 2002-2007<br /> 2007-2008<br /> 2007-2008<br /> 2008-present</span></span></th> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a><br /> → <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> (loan)<br /> <a href="/wiki/VfB_Admira_Wacker_M%C3%B6dling" title="VfB Admira Wacker Mödling" class="mw-redirect">VfB Admira Wacker Mödling</a></span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">50 (1)<br /> 117 (6)<br /> 123 (8)<br /> 6 (0)<br /> 31 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <th colspan="4" style="text-align:center; background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">National team<sup>‡</sup></th> </tr> <tr class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span style="font-weight:normal">2005-2006</span></span></th> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland"><img alt="Poland" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/23px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png" width="23" height="14" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/35px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/46px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="800" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland</a></span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">5 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <td colspan="4" class="" style="text-align:center; color:darkslategray; font-size:95%">* Senior club appearances and goals counted for the domestic league only and correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC).<br /> <p>† Appearances (Goals).<br /></p> ‡ National team caps and goals correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC)</td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Łukasz Surma</b> (born on <a href="/wiki/June_28" title="June 28">June 28</a> <a href="/wiki/1977" title="1977">1977</a> in <a href="/wiki/Krak%C3%B3w" title="Kraków">Kraków</a>) is a <a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland">Polish</a> footballer (<a href="/wiki/Defensive_midfielder" title="Defensive midfielder" class="mw-redirect">defensive midfielder</a>) playing currently for <a href="/wiki/VfB_Admira_Wacker_M%C3%B6dling" title="VfB Admira Wacker Mödling" class="mw-redirect">VfB Admira Wacker Mödling</a> .</p> <p>He was a captain of <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a> for four years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a> and <a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a>.</p> <p>On <a href="/wiki/July_5" title="July 5">July 5</a> <a href="/wiki/2007" title="2007">2007</a>, Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a>. He was loaned to <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> where he was a regular starter, helping the team finish in 3rd place.</p> <p>Surma has appeared five times for the <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland national football team</a>.</p>   <!--  NewPP limit report Parsed by mw1240 CPU time usage: 0.288 colspan="3" class="role" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><a href="/wiki/Midfielder" title="Midfielder">Midfielder</a></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <th colspan="4" style="text-align:center; background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">Club information</th> </tr> <tr class=""> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"> <div style="padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;">Current team</div> </th> <td colspan="3" class="org" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><a href="/wiki/VfB_Admira_Wacker_M%C3%B6dling" title="VfB Admira Wacker Mödling" class="mw-redirect">VfB Admira Wacker Mödling</a></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left">Number</th> <td colspan="3" class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline">-</td> </tr> <tr class=""> <th colspan="4" style="text-align:center; background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">Youth career</th> </tr> <tr class=""> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span style="font-weight:normal">1994-1996</span></span></th> <td colspan="3" class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a></span></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <th colspan="4" style="text-align:center; background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">Senior career*</th> </tr> <tr class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left">Years</th> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><b>Team</b></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><b>Apps (Gls)<sup>†</sup></b></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span style="font-weight:normal">1996-1998<br /> 1998-2002<br /> 2002-2007<br /> 2007-2008<br /> 2007-2008<br /> 2008-present</span></span></th> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a><br /> → <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> (loan)<br /> <a href="/wiki/VfB_Admira_Wacker_M%C3%B6dling" title="VfB Admira Wacker Mödling" class="mw-redirect">VfB Admira Wacker Mödling</a></span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">50 (1)<br /> 117 (6)<br /> 123 (8)<br /> 6 (0)<br /> 31 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <th colspan="4" style="text-align:center; background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">National team<sup>‡</sup></th> </tr> <tr class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span style="font-weight:normal">2005-2006</span></span></th> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland"><img alt="Poland" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/23px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png" width="23" height="14" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/35px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/46px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="800" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland</a></span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">5 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <td colspan="4" class="" style="text-align:center; color:darkslategray; font-size:95%">* Senior club appearances and goals counted for the domestic league only and correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC).<br /> <p>† Appearances (Goals).<br /></p> ‡ National team caps and goals correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC)</td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Łukasz Surma</b> (born on <a href="/wiki/June_28" title="June 28">June 28</a> <a href="/wiki/1977" title="1977">1977</a> in <a href="/wiki/Krak%C3%B3w" title="Kraków">Kraków</a>) is a <a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland">Polish</a> footballer (<a href="/wiki/Defensive_midfielder" title="Defensive midfielder" class="mw-redirect">defensive midfielder</a>) playing currently for <a href="/wiki/VfB_Admira_Wacker_M%C3%B6dling" title="VfB Admira Wacker Mödling" class="mw-redirect">VfB Admira Wacker Mödling</a> .</p> <p>He was a captain of <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a> for four years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a> and <a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a>.</p> <p>On <a href="/wiki/July_5" title="July 5">July 5</a> <a href="/wiki/2007" title="2007">2007</a>, Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a>. He was loaned to <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> where he was a regular starter, helping the team finish in 3rd place.</p> <p>Surma has appeared five times for the <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland national football team</a>.</p>   <!--  NewPP limit report Parsed by mw1109 CPU time usage: 0.389 seconds Real time usage: 0.439 seconds Preprocessor visited node count: 3078/1000000 Preprocessor generated node count: 0/1500000 Post‐expand include size: 29002/2097152 bytes Template argument size: class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland"><img alt="Poland" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/23px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png" width="23" height="14" class="thumbborder" href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland</a></span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">5 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <td colspan="4" class="" style="text-align:center; color:darkslategray; font-size:95%">* Senior club appearances and goals counted for the domestic league only and correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC).<br /> <p>† Appearances (Goals).<br /></p> ‡ National team caps and goals correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC)</td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Łukasz Surma</b> (born on <a href="/wiki/June_28" title="June 28">June 28</a> <a href="/wiki/1977" title="1977">1977</a> in <a href="/wiki/Krak%C3%B3w" title="Kraków">Kraków</a>) is a <a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland">Polish</a> footballer (<a href="/wiki/Defensive_midfielder" title="Defensive midfielder" class="mw-redirect">defensive midfielder</a>) playing currently for <a href="/wiki/VfB_Admira_Wacker_M%C3%B6dling" title="VfB Admira Wacker Mödling" class="mw-redirect">VfB Admira Wacker Mödling</a> .</p> <p>He was a captain of <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a> for four years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a> and <a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a>.</p> <p>On <a href="/wiki/July_5" title="July 5">July 5</a> <a href="/wiki/2007" title="2007">2007</a>, Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a>. He was loaned to <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> where he was a regular starter, helping the team finish in 3rd place.</p> <p>Surma has appeared five times for the <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland national football team</a>.</p>   <!--  NewPP limit report Parsed by mw1250 CPU time usage: 0.249 seconds Real time usage: 0.292 seconds Preprocessor visited node count: 3078/1000000 Preprocessor generated node count: 0/1500000 Post‐expand include size: 29002/2097152 bytes Template argument size: class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland"><img alt="Poland" style="text-align:center; color:darkslategray; font-size:95%">* Senior club appearances and goals counted for the domestic league only and correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC).<br /> <p>† Appearances (Goals).<br /></p> ‡ National team caps and goals correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC)</td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Łukasz Surma</b> (born on <a href="/wiki/June_28" title="June 28">June 28</a> <a href="/wiki/1977" title="1977">1977</a> in <a href="/wiki/Krak%C3%B3w" title="Kraków">Kraków</a>) is a <a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland">Polish</a> footballer (<a href="/wiki/Defensive_midfielder" title="Defensive midfielder" class="mw-redirect">defensive midfielder</a>) playing currently for <a href="/wiki/VfB_Admira_Wacker_M%C3%B6dling" title="VfB Admira Wacker Mödling" class="mw-redirect">VfB Admira Wacker Mödling</a> .</p> <p>He was a captain of <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a> for four years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a> and <a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a>.</p> <p>On <a href="/wiki/July_5" title="July 5">July 5</a> <a href="/wiki/2007" title="2007">2007</a>, Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a>. He was loaned to <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> where he was a regular starter, helping the team finish in 3rd place.</p> <p>Surma has appeared five times for the <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland national football team</a>.</p>   <!--  NewPP limit report Parsed by mw1084 CPU time usage: 0.385 class="diff-context"><div>}}</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>}}</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div>'''Łukasz Surma''' (born on [[June 28]]<del class="diffchange diffchange-inline"> ,</del> [[1977]] in [[Kraków]]) is a [[Poland|Polish]] footballer ([[defensive midfielder]]) playing currently for [[<del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">Bnei</del> <del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">Sakhnin</del> <del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">F.C.|Bnei</del> <del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">Sakhnin]],loaned</del> <del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">from [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa</del>]]<del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">. He was a captain of [[Legia Warszawa]] for 4 years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like [[Ruch Chorzów]] (1998-2002) and [[Wisła Kraków]] (1996-1998). Surma also played for the [[Poland national football team]] (5A). On [[July 5]], [[2007]] Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]]. He was loaned to [[Bnei Sakhnin F.C.|Bnei Sakhnin]] and became instantly regular player finished season on 3rd position</del>.</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>'''Łukasz Surma''' (born on [[June 28]] [[1977]] in [[Kraków]]) is a [[Poland|Polish]] footballer ([[defensive midfielder]]) playing currently for [[<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">VfB</ins> <ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">Admira</ins> <ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">Wacker</ins> <ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">Mödling</ins> ]].</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>He was a captain of [[Legia Warszawa]] for four years. text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span style="font-weight:normal">1996-1998<br /> 1998-2002<br /> 2002-2007<br /> 2007-2008<br /> 2007-2008<br /> 2008-present</span></span></th> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a><br /> → <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> (<i>loan</i>)<br /> <a href="/wiki/VfB_Admira_Wacker_M%C3%B6dling" title="VfB Admira Wacker Mödling" class="mw-redirect">VfB Admira Wacker Mödling</a></span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">50 (1)<br /> 117 (6)<br /> 123 (8)<br /> 6 (0)<br /> 31 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <th colspan="4" style="text-align:center; background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">National team<sup>‡</sup></th> </tr> <tr class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span style="font-weight:normal">2005-2006</span></span></th> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland"><img alt="Poland" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/23px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png" width="23" height="14" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/35px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/46px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="800" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland</a></span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">5 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <td colspan="4" class="" style="text-align:center; color:darkslategray; font-size:95%">* Senior club appearances and goals counted for the domestic league only and correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC).<br /> <p>† Appearances (Goals).<br /></p> ‡ National team caps and goals correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC)</td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Łukasz Surma</b> (born on <a href="/wiki/June_28" title="June 28">June 28</a> <a href="/wiki/1977" title="1977">1977</a> in <a href="/wiki/Krak%C3%B3w" title="Kraków">Kraków</a>) is a <a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland">Polish</a> footballer (<a href="/wiki/Defensive_midfielder" title="Defensive midfielder" class="mw-redirect">defensive midfielder</a>) playing currently for <a href="/wiki/VfB_Admira_Wacker_M%C3%B6dling" title="VfB Admira Wacker Mödling" class="mw-redirect">VfB Admira Wacker Mödling</a> .</p> <p>He was a captain of <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a> for four years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a> and <a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a>.</p> <p>On <a href="/wiki/July_5" title="July 5">July 5</a> <a href="/wiki/2007" title="2007">2007</a>, Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a>. He was loaned to <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> where he was a regular starter, helping the team finish in 3rd place.</p> <p>Surma has appeared five times for the <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland national football team</a>.</p>   <!--  NewPP limit report Parsed by mw1020 CPU time usage: 0.439 class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>}}</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div>'''Łukasz Surma''' (born on [[June 28]]<del class="diffchange diffchange-inline"> ,</del> [[1977]] in [[Kraków]]) is a [[Poland|Polish]] footballer ([[defensive midfielder]]) playing currently for<del class="diffchange diffchange-inline"> [[Bnei Sakhnin F.C.|Bnei Sakhnin]],loaned from [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]]. He was a captain of [[Legia Warszawa]] for 4 years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like [[Ruch Chorzów]] (1998-2002) and [[Wisła Kraków]] (1996-1998). Surma also played for the [[Poland national football team]]. On [[July 5]], [[2007]] Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side</del> [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]].</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>'''Łukasz Surma''' (born on [[June 28]] [[1977]] in [[Kraków]]) is a [[Poland|Polish]] footballer ([[defensive midfielder]]) playing currently for [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]].</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td colspan="2" class="diff-empty">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>He was a captain of [[Legia Warszawa]] for foutyears. vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a><br /> <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a><br /> → <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> (loan)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">50 (1)<br /> 117 (6)<br /> 123 (8)<br /> 6 (0)<br /> 31 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <th colspan="4" style="text-align:center; background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">National team<sup>‡</sup></th> </tr> <tr class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span style="font-weight:normal">2005-2006</span></span></th> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland"><img alt="Poland" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/23px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png" width="23" height="14" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/35px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/46px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="800" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland</a></span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">5 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <td colspan="4" class="" style="text-align:center; color:darkslategray; font-size:95%">* Senior club appearances and goals counted for the domestic league only and correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC).<br /> <p>† Appearances (Goals).<br /></p> ‡ National team caps and goals correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC)</td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Łukasz Surma</b> (born on <a href="/wiki/June_28" title="June 28">June 28</a> <a href="/wiki/1977" title="1977">1977</a> in <a href="/wiki/Krak%C3%B3w" title="Kraków">Kraków</a>) is a <a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland">Polish</a> footballer (<a href="/wiki/Defensive_midfielder" title="Defensive midfielder" class="mw-redirect">defensive midfielder</a>) playing currently for <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a>.</p> <p>He was a captain of <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a> for foutyears. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a> and <a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a>.</p> <p>On <a href="/wiki/July_5" title="July 5">July 5</a> <a href="/wiki/2007" title="2007">2007</a>, Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a>. He was loaned to <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> and became instantly regular player finished season on 3rd position.</p> <p>Surma also played for the <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland national football team</a> (5A).</p> <p><br /></p> <table class="navbox" style="border-spacing:0"> <tr> <td class="diff-context"><div>}}</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>}}</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">−</td>   <td class="diff-deletedline"><div>'''Łukasz Surma''' (born on [[June 28]] , [[1977]] in [[Kraków]]) is a [[Poland|Polish]] footballer ([[defensive midfielder]]) playing currently for [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]]. He was a captain of [[Legia Warszawa]] for 4 years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like [[Ruch Chorzów]] (1998-2002) and [[Wisła Kraków]] (1996-1998). Surma also played for the [[Poland national football team]]. On [[July 5]], [[2007]] Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]].</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>'''Łukasz Surma''' (born on [[June 28]] , [[1977]] in [[Kraków]]) is a [[Poland|Polish]] footballer ([[defensive midfielder]]) playing currently for<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline"> [[Bnei Sakhnin F.C.|Bnei Sakhnin]],loaned from</ins> [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]]. He was a captain of [[Legia Warszawa]] for 4 years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like [[Ruch Chorzów]] (1998-2002) and [[Wisła Kraków]] (1996-1998). Surma also played for the [[Poland national football team]]<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline"> (5A)</ins>. On [[July 5]], [[2007]] Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]]<ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">. He was loaned to [[Bnei Sakhnin F.C.|Bnei Sakhnin]] and become instantly regular player finished season on 3rd position</ins>.</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{Maccabi Haifa F.C. squad}}</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{Maccabi Haifa F.C. squad}}</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 12:01, 14 June 2008</h2> <table class="infobox vcard" cellspacing="5" style="width: 22em; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">50 (1)<br /> 117 (6)<br /> 123 (8)<br /> 6 (0)<br /> 31 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <th colspan="4" style="text-align:center; background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">National team<sup>‡</sup></th> </tr> <tr class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"> <th style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span style="font-weight:normal">2005-2006</span></span></th> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline"><span style="line-height:1.7em"><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland"><img alt="Poland" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/23px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png" width="23" height="14" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/35px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/46px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="800" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland</a></span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="line-height:1.7em">5 (0)</span></td> <td class="" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right"></td> </tr> <tr class=""> <td colspan="4" class="" style="text-align:center; color:darkslategray; font-size:95%">* Senior club appearances and goals counted for the domestic league only and correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC).<br /> <p>† Appearances (Goals).<br /></p> ‡ National team caps and goals correct as of 00:49, 9 July 2007 (UTC)</td> </tr> </table> <p><b>Łukasz Surma</b> (born on <a href="/wiki/June_28" title="June 28">June 28</a> , <a href="/wiki/1977" title="1977">1977</a> in <a href="/wiki/Krak%C3%B3w" title="Kraków">Kraków</a>) is a <a href="/wiki/Poland" title="Poland">Polish</a> footballer (<a href="/wiki/Defensive_midfielder" title="Defensive midfielder" class="mw-redirect">defensive midfielder</a>) playing currently for <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a>,loaned from <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a>. He was a captain of <a href="/wiki/Legia_Warszawa" title="Legia Warszawa" class="mw-redirect">Legia Warszawa</a> for 4 years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like <a href="/wiki/Ruch_Chorz%C3%B3w" title="Ruch Chorzów">Ruch Chorzów</a> (1998-2002) and <a href="/wiki/Wis%C5%82a_Krak%C3%B3w" title="Wisła Kraków">Wisła Kraków</a> (1996-1998). Surma also played for the <a href="/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team">Poland national football team</a> (5A). On <a href="/wiki/July_5" title="July 5">July 5</a>, <a href="/wiki/2007" title="2007">2007</a> Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side <a href="/wiki/Maccabi_Haifa_F.C." title="Maccabi Haifa F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a>. He was loaned to <a href="/wiki/Bnei_Sakhnin_F.C." title="Bnei Sakhnin F.C.">Bnei Sakhnin</a> and become instantly regular player finished season on 3rd position.</p> <table class="navbox" class="diff-deletedline"><div>'''Łukasz Surma''' (born on [[June 28]] , [[1977]] in [[Kraków]]) is a [[Poland|Polish]] footballer ([[defensive midfielder]]) playing currently for <del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">[[Maccabi</del> <del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">Haifa</del> <del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">F.C</del>.<del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">|Maccabi</del> Haifa<del class="diffchange diffchange-inline">]]</del>. He was a captain of [[Legia Warszawa]] for 4 years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like [[Ruch Chorzów]] (1998-2002) and [[Wisła Kraków]] (1996-1998). Surma also played for the [[Poland national football team]]. On [[July 5]], [[2007]] Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]].</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">+</td>   <td class="diff-addedline"><div>'''Łukasz Surma''' (born on [[June 28]] , [[1977]] in [[Kraków]]) is a [[Poland|Polish]] footballer ([[defensive midfielder]]) playing currently for <ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">Bnei</ins> <ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">Sakhnin,loaned</ins> <ins class="diffchange diffchange-inline">from M</ins>. Haifa. He was a captain of [[Legia Warszawa]] for 4 years. With this team he won Polish Championship in 2006. In the past years he played for clubs like [[Ruch Chorzów]] (1998-2002) and [[Wisła Kraków]] (1996-1998). Surma also played for the [[Poland national football team]]. On [[July 5]], [[2007]] Lukasz Surma signed for Israeli side [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]].</div></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"></td> </tr> <tr>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{Maccabi Haifa F.C. squad}}</div></td>   <td class="diff-marker">&#160;</td>   <td class="diff-context"><div>{{Maccabi Haifa F.C. squad}}</div></td> </tr> </table><hr class='diff-hr' id='mw-oldid' /> 		<h2 class='diff-currentversion-title'>Revision as of 16:38, 22 April 2008</h2> <table class="infobox vcard" cellspacing="5" style="width: 22em;
